attributes.action: Publically Name and Shame Hotels/Restaurants etc that breach health and safety regulations/laws
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Without naming names I have heard rumours from others that
     several hotel kitchens in my area alone have pest infestations
     and mangagers who continually ignore food hygiene regulations.
     I think offending outlets should be named and shamed in local
     newspapers, websites etc.
